name: Cubicshogi
short_description:
Instead of classical figures are used dice to each side separately symbol king , rook , bishop , knight and pawn . It is played on a board with a 8x8 array. The last three rows (territory for rival pawns early in the game ) are the promotion zone .
Mobility figures :
  King      > one field in each direction ,
 General > as the king laid back than action .
 Rook    > the columns and rows,
 Bishop  > the diagonal
 Knight   > ahead of the two fields adjacent column -                    
         may skip the other figures, in addition to moving horizontally on one field ,
 Pawn    > one space forward as well and takes .
Captured units are stored in the stack, in which to start the game two white and two black pawns.  A pawn and the knight, after entering into the promotion zone instantly turns to general by rotating its cube.
summary: Japanese chess Shogi have such classic chess , several variants. Not o
